comments:

However, the status object from core is of the form:
status= MultiStatus  (id=292)
  message= "Problems encountered while deleting resources."
  children= IStatus[1]  (id=296)
    [0]= MultiStatus  (id=301)

      children= IStatus[1]  (id=302)

workspace\\Java\\Test2.doc."

Note also that the message "Could not delete: /Java." does not appear in the 
log.

The "Could not delete: /Java" message does appear in the log:

!SUBENTRY 1 org.eclipse.core.resources 4 273 Dec 08, 2003 23:54:56.683

However, the duplicated child entry is strange.

This hasn't been reproduced and the code has changed significantly since then.
Closing, but will reopen if this occurs in 3.1.
